Package org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor

Class FormulaEditor<T extends Logic>

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor.Editor<FormulaHolder<T>>
org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor.FormulaEditor<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the logic
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.awt.print.Printable, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.DocumentListener, javax.swing.event.UndoableEditListener, EditableListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
ACTLEditor, OmegaRegularExpressionEditor, QPTLEditor, RegularExpressionEditor
public abstract class FormulaEditor<T extends Logic>
extends Editor<FormulaHolder<T>>
implements javax.swing.event.DocumentListener, java.io.Serializable, EditableListener, javax.swing.event.UndoableEditListener
A FormulaEditor is an editor for logic formulae.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
